name: World VR baseball
description:
World VR baseball is  a VR Game!!!  A downloadable game for Windows Mixed reality and Oculus Quest

Hit the ball thrown by the robot away.  Additional points are added to the score if the ball is over 100m.

[Credits]

  • SKY:  AllSky Free - 10 Sky / Skybox Set | 2D Sky | Unity Asset Store
  • Turret: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/weapons/fatty-poly-turret-part-2-free-15998
  • CIty: Construction futuristic voxel pack | 3D Sci-Fi | Unity Asset Store
  • Bat: Baseball Bats – Pack | 3D Weapons | Unity Asset Store
  • Music: Dark Future Music | Electronic Music | Unity Asset Store
